channel.title: [Help] ASAP!
channel.description: I'm having a horrible problem! All my players, and I will be on the server then we will lagg. And when we try to log in it will say unable to connect to server(as in it isn't online, but it is!) And then I look at the command prompt for my server and it will say ClientHandler: Rejected Client Null Disconected then the players ip Then they will try to log in one more time and it will say banning host. Please help me!!!

item.title: [Help] ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Vhenom, post:9, topic:382425”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=478221.msg3500426#msg3500426 date=1297688828]
I’m guessing your server is inefficient and riddled with bugs and leaks. What’s the source?

It’s blank source. But the guy that replied on top of you post, helped me out but thanks.
[/quote][/quote]
Please learn to quote right, it’s a bit annoying. Only post after the final [/quote].

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Remove the banHost() method from the Server class.
As for the lag, clean up your process() methods.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:5, topic:382425”][quote author=Vhenom link=topic=478221.msg3500408#msg3500408 date=1297686784]

The lag is probably because you have insufficient RAM.

I have 8Gb of Ram just dedicated to this server, and this has never happened to me before, even when i hosted my other server.

[/quote]
[sup]Chat effects aren’t necessary.[/sup]

Yeah i Know, i just wanted to make sure you saw mine from you text.[/quote]

Read full topic
